posts.author: Sarah Mohammed
posts.title: A Quick Programming Tip
posts.content: When building Flutter apps, always try to separate your business logic from the UI.

comments.author: Ahmed Al-Otaibi
comments.content: Good reminder! Separation makes debugging much easier.

posts.author: Laila Hassan
posts.title: Exploring Flutter Widgets
posts.content: Widgets are the building blocks of Flutter. Understanding stateless and stateful widgets is key to mastering Flutter UI.

comments.author: Ahmed Al-Otaibi
comments.content: Very informative! Thanks for the clear explanation.

comments.author: Sarah Mohammed
comments.content: I love how simple Flutter makes UI design!

comments.author: John Smith
comments.content: Great post, Laila. This helped me understand stateful widgets better.
